rdf:Description.dc:title: Policing in relation to the Blood Tribe : report of a public inquiry 1991 report of a public inquiry.
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Commission of Inquiry--Policing in Relation to the Blood Tribe (Alta.)
Rolf, C. H.
rdf:Description.dc:description: v. 1. Findings and recommendations.--v. 2. Executive summary.

This summary of a public inquiry into Royal Canadian Mounted Police action in dealing with members of the Blood Indian tribe in southern Alberta, lists the mandate of the inquiry, outlines its conclusions regarding desirable changes in the current administration of justice and makes recommendations.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Royal Canadian Mounted Police.
Criminal justice, Administration of
Indians of North America
Indians of North America
Police administration
